title: SW Italian subtitles
content:
Hello there,

I'm trying to find the subtitle font(s) used in the Italian theatrical version of "Star Wars" (around 1978). The attached images show a few shots of it. To me it looks like a mix of letters from both Gill Sans and Johnston... but I'm not sure. Is there possibly a single font that represents this?

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gr\_it\_1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620204510/http:/typophile.com/files/gr_it_1.png) | 564.29 KB |
| [gr\_it\_2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620204510/http:/typophile.com/files/gr_it_2.png) | 570.66 KB |
| [gr\_it\_3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620204510/http:/typophile.com/files/gr_it_3.png) | 529.88 KB |
author: Laserschwert

comments.content:
In the Italian version Greedo spits first.

hhp
